attributes.action: All Age Looters should get the maximum prison sentences!
attributes.additional_details:
If they are old enough to create the crime then they are old enough to face the consequence. This is sickening and ridiculous for us to see for U.K as a whole, please sign this if you feel all looters should face the maximum prison sentence!

Not enough prison cells then deport them, build more! we shouldnt tolerate and let these people off with short sentences! Make prison a prison and not ones for them to enjoy themselves inside!
